_sText:
Add to your cstrike/maps folder

Recommended on a NoBlock server
 -Come play on ours!
  -GamerSquared's Minigame/Original Maps Server![NoBlock|FastDL] 66.151.244.188:27015


After much testing...this is the final version to my map.

Final version is bug-free.

The map is extended and now longer.

Changed the lighting to make it more of a visible map.

There are now 5 ways to kill the T if you win the race. Including 3 secret buttons.

4 Hidden flash bangs to be used by the CT's for defense against the T using the cannon.


The object is for the CT's to complete the course without getting blasted by the cannon which is controlled by the T's.

There are many different obstacles for the CT's to overcome. The cannon shoots every .75 seconds which allows the CT's to time the cannons shots will hiding behind the various structures.

Here is a video of the map. Please check it out!

[Check out the video of my map!](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cF9Mq94zU-c "mg_g2_RUN_finalvirgin")
